about_the_game: "RUINED Part 1" DLC features a new map with new and familiar characters with new story. The DLC features a whole new game play mechanics. In addition the DLC invites players to venture deeper into a world consumed by decay. Traverse haunting landscapes, face new challenges, and forge alliances. Unravel an enigmatic narrative filled with moral dilemmas. Enhanced visuals, immersive gameplay, and a haunting soundtrack redefine the "RUINED" experience. Are you prepared to explore the mysteries lurking within RUINED Part 1 out of 3 DLCs?
detailed_description: "RUINED Part 1" DLC features a new map with new and familiar characters with new story. The DLC features a whole new game play mechanics. In addition the DLC invites players to venture deeper into a world consumed by decay. Traverse haunting landscapes, face new challenges, and forge alliances. Unravel an enigmatic narrative filled with moral dilemmas. Enhanced visuals, immersive gameplay, and a haunting soundtrack redefine the "RUINED" experience. Are you prepared to explore the mysteries lurking within RUINED Part 1 out of 3 DLCs?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 home
  • Processor: i5 10th gen or Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060 or GTX 1660 super
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: i7 10th gen or Ryzen 7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 or RX 6900 XT
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

pegi.descriptors: World War 1" is designed for players aged 13 and above. The game features strategic gameplay, intense battles, and a complex storyline that may be more suitable for older teenagers and adults. Additionally, the game's themes of war, conflict, and strategic decision-making may be better understood and appreciated by players in this age range. However, parental guidance is always advised, and individual maturity levels should be considered when determining if the game is appropriate for a player.

short_description: Embark on an enigmatic odyssey with "RUINED Part 1" DLC. Uncover secrets in a decaying world, battling foes and moral quandaries. Enhanced visuals, immersive gameplay, and a haunting soundtrack await. Redefine your understanding of "RUINED" in this gripping expansion.
